editPost(uint256,string,string).details: A user should pay to edit post. The rationale is, to ensure users go through their content before posting since editing of content is not free

createPost(string,string).notice: only a registered user can create posts on the platform

editPost(uint256,string,string).notice: To effect the payment functionality, we include a receive function to enable the smart contract receive ether. Also, we use Chainlink pricefeed to ensure ether is amount has the required usd equivalent

getUserPosts(address).notice: Deleted the function that used a for loop to determine vote status of user because for loops are not gas efficient in Solidity. Replaced the function with a mapping `s_hasVoted` in the mappings section above.
